ModMetaData.name: ESCP - Septims Re-Minted
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato, Rick
ModMetaData.description:
A remade version of the original ESCP Septims mod, made with compatibility in mind.

Adds in a new currency, and gives it to all factions, without overwriting the vanilla silver def.

- Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded
- Requires Harmony
- Original assembly by Taranchuk
- Original mod by Ranger Rick.
- Based on the ‘Elder Scrolls’ series by Bethesda Game Studios
